title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/codemirror-themes
author: Gk0Wk
name: CodeMirror Themes Pack
description: Tons of codemirror themes for TiddlyWiki's codemirror editor
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://gk0wk.github.io/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://gk0wk.github.io/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced"/></$button>

After install, you will have multiple themes selectable in ControlPanel's codemirror config.
